pipirumak ha ginijalawak samaga pathitha wunu me ulkapathaya nisa giya sikurada ude waruwe rusiyawe punchi nagarayaka wasiyan biyapath wuna witharak neweyi, in athi wu maha pipiruma hethuwen dahasak pamana denata thuwala sidu wuna.

kese namuth me atharin thel nidhi sambandha aramunu atham niladharin wisin prathikshepa kota atha.
mage nama mulwarata mudranayen dakapu ee mohotha kawadakawath mata amathaka wenne naha.”
